verses.kjv: I will love thee, O LORD, my strength.
verses.ct: I love you, LORD — you are my strength.

verses.kjv: The LORD is my rock, and my fortress, and my deliverer; my God, my strength, in whom I will trust; my buckler, and the horn of my salvation, and my high tower.
verses.ct: The LORD is my rock, my fortress, and my rescuer. My God is my strength, and I take refuge in him. He is my shield, the power of my salvation, and my stronghold.

verses.kjv: I will call upon the LORD, who is worthy to be praised: so shall I be saved from mine enemies.
verses.ct: I call out to the LORD, who deserves all praise, and I am rescued from my enemies.

verses.kjv: The sorrows of death compassed me, and the floods of ungodly men made me afraid.
verses.ct: The ropes of death wrapped around me, and torrents of destruction overwhelmed me with terror.

verses.kjv: The sorrows of hell compassed me about: the snares of death prevented me.
verses.ct: The cords of the grave entangled me, and the traps of death confronted me.

verses.kjv: In my distress I called upon the LORD, and cried unto my God: he heard my voice out of his temple, and my cry came before him, even into his ears.
verses.ct: In my desperation I called out to the LORD and cried to my God for help. From his temple he heard my voice, and my cry for help reached his ears.

verses.kjv: Then the earth shook and trembled; the foundations also of the hills moved and were shaken, because he was wroth.
verses.ct: Then the earth shook and trembled. The foundations of the mountains quaked and shifted because he was angry.

verses.kjv: There went up a smoke out of his nostrils, and fire out of his mouth devoured: coals were kindled by it.
verses.ct: Smoke rose from his nostrils, and consuming fire poured from his mouth. Burning coals blazed from him.

verses.kjv: He bowed the heavens also, and came down: and darkness was under his feet.
verses.ct: He parted the heavens and descended, with thick darkness beneath his feet.

verses.kjv: And he rode upon a cherub, and did fly: yea, he did fly upon the wings of the wind.
verses.ct: He mounted a cherub and flew, soaring on the wings of the wind.

verses.kjv: He made darkness his secret place; his pavilion round about him were dark waters and thick clouds of the skies.
verses.ct: He wrapped himself in darkness as his covering. His canopy around him was dark rain clouds and dense thunderheads.

verses.kjv: At the brightness that was before him his thick clouds passed, hail stones and coals of fire.
verses.ct: Out of the brilliance in his presence, his clouds burst open with hailstones and bolts of fire.

verses.kjv: The LORD also thundered in the heavens, and the Highest gave his voice; hail stones and coals of fire.
verses.ct: The LORD thundered from the heavens, and the Most High let his voice ring out — hailstones and bolts of fire.

verses.kjv: Yea, he sent out his arrows, and scattered them; and he shot out lightnings, and discomfited them.
verses.ct: He launched his arrows and scattered my enemies. He hurled lightning bolts and threw them into confusion.

verses.kjv: Then the channels of waters were seen, and the foundations of the world were discovered at thy rebuke, O LORD, at the blast of the breath of thy nostrils.
verses.ct: Then the channels of the sea were exposed, and the foundations of the earth were laid bare at your rebuke, LORD, at the blast of breath from your nostrils.

verses.kjv: He sent from above, he took me, he drew me out of many waters.
verses.ct: He reached down from above and took hold of me. He pulled me out of deep waters.

verses.kjv: He delivered me from my strong enemy, and from them which hated me: for they were too strong for me.
verses.ct: He rescued me from my powerful enemy, from those who hated me — they were too strong for me.

verses.kjv: They prevented me in the day of my calamity: but the LORD was my stay.
verses.ct: They ambushed me on the day of my disaster, but the LORD was my support.

verses.kjv: He brought me forth also into a large place; he delivered me, because he delighted in me.
verses.ct: He brought me out into an open place. He rescued me because he was pleased with me.

verses.kjv: The LORD rewarded me according to my righteousness; according to the cleanness of my hands hath he recompensed me.
verses.ct: The LORD has rewarded me for my righteousness. He has repaid me because my hands are clean.

verses.kjv: For I have kept the ways of the LORD, and have not wickedly departed from my God.
verses.ct: I have followed the ways of the LORD and have not turned away from my God in wickedness.

verses.kjv: For all his judgments were before me, and I did not put away his statutes from me.
verses.ct: All his laws were constantly in front of me, and I never pushed aside his commands.

verses.kjv: I was also upright before him, and I kept myself from mine iniquity.
verses.ct: I was blameless in his presence and guarded myself against my own sin.

verses.kjv: Therefore hath the LORD recompensed me according to my righteousness, according to the cleanness of my hands in his eyesight.
verses.ct: So the LORD has repaid me for my righteousness, for the cleanness of my hands as he sees it.

verses.kjv: With the merciful thou wilt shew thyself merciful; with an upright man thou wilt shew thyself upright;
verses.ct: To the merciful, you show yourself merciful. To the person of integrity, you show yourself full of integrity.

verses.kjv: With the pure thou wilt shew thyself pure; and with the froward thou wilt shew thyself froward.
verses.ct: To the pure, you show yourself pure, but to the crooked, you show yourself shrewd.

verses.kjv: For thou wilt save the afflicted people; but wilt bring down high looks.
verses.ct: You rescue humble people, but you bring down those with arrogant eyes.

verses.kjv: For thou wilt light my candle: the LORD my God will enlighten my darkness.
verses.ct: You light my lamp, LORD. My God turns my darkness into light.

verses.kjv: For by thee I have run through a troop; and by my God have I leaped over a wall.
verses.ct: With your help I can charge against an army, and with my God I can scale a wall.

verses.kjv: As for God, his way is perfect: the word of the LORD is tried: he is a buckler to all those that trust in him.
verses.ct: God's way is flawless. The word of the LORD has been proven true. He is a shield to everyone who takes refuge in him.

verses.kjv: For who is God save the LORD? or who is a rock save our God?
verses.ct: For who is God except the LORD? And who is a rock besides our God?

verses.kjv: It is God that girdeth me with strength, and maketh my way perfect.
verses.ct: God is the one who equips me with strength and makes my path secure.

verses.kjv: He maketh my feet like hinds’ feet, and setteth me upon my high places.
verses.ct: He makes my feet as sure as a deer's and sets me firmly on the heights.

verses.kjv: He teacheth my hands to war, so that a bow of steel is broken by mine arms.
verses.ct: He trains my hands for battle so that my arms can bend a bow of bronze.

verses.kjv: Thou hast also given me the shield of thy salvation: and thy right hand hath holden me up, and thy gentleness hath made me great.
verses.ct: You have given me the shield of your salvation. Your right hand has held me up, and your care has made me great.

verses.kjv: Thou hast enlarged my steps under me, that my feet did not slip.
verses.ct: You have made the path wide beneath my feet so that my ankles never gave way.

verses.kjv: I have pursued mine enemies, and overtaken them: neither did I turn again till they were consumed.
verses.ct: I chased my enemies and caught up with them. I did not turn back until they were finished.

verses.kjv: I have wounded them that they were not able to rise: they are fallen under my feet.
verses.ct: I struck them down so they could not get up. They collapsed beneath my feet.

verses.kjv: For thou hast girded me with strength unto the battle: thou hast subdued under me those that rose up against me.
verses.ct: You equipped me with strength for the battle. You forced those who rose against me to bow down before me.

verses.kjv: Thou hast also given me the necks of mine enemies; that I might destroy them that hate me.
verses.ct: You made my enemies turn their backs to me in retreat, and I destroyed those who hated me.

verses.kjv: They cried, but there was none to save them: even unto the LORD, but he answered them not.
verses.ct: They cried for help, but no one came to save them. They even cried out to the LORD, but he did not answer them.

verses.kjv: Then did I beat them small as the dust before the wind: I did cast them out as the dirt in the streets.
verses.ct: I ground them as fine as dust blown by the wind. I swept them away like mud in the streets.

verses.kjv: Thou hast delivered me from the strivings of the people; and thou hast made me the head of the heathen: a people whom I have not known shall serve me.
verses.ct: You have rescued me from the conflicts of the people. You have made me the ruler of nations. People I never knew now serve me.

verses.kjv: As soon as they hear of me, they shall obey me: the strangers shall submit themselves unto me.
verses.ct: The moment they hear about me, they obey me. Foreigners come cringing before me.

verses.kjv: The strangers shall fade away, and be afraid out of their close places.
verses.ct: Foreigners lose their courage and come trembling from their fortifications.

verses.kjv: The LORD liveth; and blessed be my rock; and let the God of my salvation be exalted.
verses.ct: The LORD lives! Praise be to my rock! May the God of my salvation be lifted high!

verses.kjv: It is God that avengeth me, and subdueth the people under me.
verses.ct: He is the God who avenges me and brings nations under my authority.

verses.kjv: He delivereth me from mine enemies: yea, thou liftest me up above those that rise up against me: thou hast delivered me from the violent man.
verses.ct: He rescues me from my enemies. You raise me above those who attack me and save me from violent people.

verses.kjv: Therefore will I give thanks unto thee, O LORD, among the heathen, and sing praises unto thy name.
verses.ct: For this reason I will praise you among the nations, LORD, and sing songs to honor your name.

verses.kjv: Great deliverance giveth he to his king; and sheweth mercy to his anointed, to David, and to his seed for evermore.
verses.ct: He gives great victories to his king and shows mercy to his anointed — to David and his descendants forever.
